articles.title: Dave Grohl says Post Malone’s Nirvana livestream “sounded great” - NME
articles.description: Dave Grohl has praised Post Malone's recent 'Post Malone x Nirvana tribute' livestream, in which the rapper performed a 75-minute set of Nirvana covers.
articles.content:
Dave Grohl has praised Post Malone‘s recent ‘Post Malone x Nirvana tribute‘ livestream, in which the rapper performed a 75-minute set of Nirvana covers.
Malone, who is a longtime fan of the iconic trio, performed some of Nirvanas best-loved hits during his l… [+1777 chars]

articles.title: Little Richard obituary | Register - The Times
articles.description: No word in the dictionary summed up the uninhibited frenzy of rock’n’roll better than Little Richard’s “A-wop-bop-a-loo-bop-a-wop-bam-boom”.He kicked off his first hit Tutti Frutti with the feral cry
articles.content:
No word in the dictionary summed up the uninhibited frenzy of rocknroll better than Little Richards A-wop-bop-a-loo-bop-a-wop-bam-boom.

articles.author: Ellie Kirwin-Jones
articles.title: Amanda Holden opens up on 'excruciating' moment at Simon Cowell's house 'I bit the bullet' - Express
articles.description: AMANDA HOLDEN - who judges Britain's Got Talent alongside Simon Cowell, Alesha Dixon and David Walliams - has opened up about an 'excruciating' moment while she was around BGT co-star Simon's house.
articles.content:
Amanda went on to add: "Chris [her husband] and I had a baby born sleeping in an NHS hospital, and then the following year our lovely daughter Holly, our rainbow baby.
"But then I had an awful birth, I went into a coma so that was horrendous and they held Ch… [+370 chars]

articles.author: Vicki Newman
articles.title: Prince Harry and Meghan Markle 'hire Beckhams' former Hollywood aide' - Mirror Online
articles.description: The royal couple are said to have hired Rebecca Mostow, who formerly worked for David and Victoria Beckham, to help run their new lives in Beverly Hills
articles.content:
Prince Harry and Meghan Markle have reportedly hired the Beckhams' former Hollywood aide to help run their new lives in Beverly Hills.
